segments.template: {{ if .RepoURL }}{{ url (if eq .RepoHost "github.com" "\uf09b" (if eq .RepoHost "gitlab.com" "\uf296" (if eq .RepoHost "bitbucket.org" "\uf171" (if eq .RepoHost "dev.azure.com" "\uf375" "\ue725")))) .RepoURL }}{{ else }}{{ end }} {{ .RepoName }}{{ .HEAD }}{{ if .BranchStatus }} {{ .BranchStatus }}{{ end }}{{ if or (.Working.Changed) (.Staging.Changed) }} |{{ end }}{{ if .Staging.Changed }}<#FFB86C>  {{ .Staging.String }}{{ end }}{{ if and (.Working.Changed) (.Staging.Changed) }} |{{ end }}{{ if .Working.Changed }}<#FF5555>  {{ .Working.String }}{{ end }}{{ if gt .StashCount 0 }}<#F1FA8C>  {{ .StashCount }}{{ end }}
